title: One-Pan Cheddar Mac
directions: Bring broth to a boil in a large saucepan; add macaroni and reduce heat to medium-high. Cook according to package directions, stirring frequently. DO NOT DRAIN.
Remove from heat; stir in cheeses and black pepper, if desired, until cheese is melted.
ingredients: 1/4 cup reduced-fat cream cheese or low-fat Greek yogurt
